string-array.name: sensor_descr
string-array.item: Contains temperature measurement. Range of values -180:180 C
Contains pressure measurement. Range of values 0:1500 mbar
Contains humidity measurement. Range of values 0:100 %
Contains pitch measurement. Range of values -180:180 rad
Contains roll measurement. Range of values -180:180 rad
Contains yaw measurement. Range of values -180:180 rad
Allows you to set user states.
